basics.name: Tom Han Chongye
basics.label: Incoming Research Assistant at Salk Institute
basics.summary: B.A. in Molecular and Cellular Biology and Computer Science

education.area: Molecular and Cellular Biology, Computer Science

work.summary: Honors Student for Dr. Hadley Horch
highlights: Created a novel analysis pipeline for flight behavior in G. bimaculatus from data collection to analysis report.
Conducted full time original research to understand the basis of adaptive behaviors and plasticity in adult crickets.
Processed over 100+ GB of high throughput pose estimation data, reduced analysis runtime by 50%

awards.title: CS Senior Book Award
awards.summary: Awarded to Senior in CS major demonstrated excellence in coursework and incorpated concepts in CS in their research works.

awards.title: Sarah and James Bowdoin Scholar
awards.summary: Similar to Dean's List, Awarded for academic excellence.
